content: if you re looking for easy knitted sweater pattern you re in the perfect place this slouchy relaxed fit knit sweater is super simple to make if it s your first knitted garment this is one you ll finish and flaunt with pride stop selling yourself short and make yourself a beautiful handmade sweater at home pattern includes a step by step photo tutorial as well as a follow along video tutorial terms are in us terminology and includes us women s sizes xs-xxl materials i used debbie bliss dulcie in color pebble #5 bulky weight yarn us 11/8 mm 22″ circular needles for the neckline ribbing and sleeves us 11/8 mm 36-40″ circular needles for the body scissors yarn needle stitch marker skill easy notes the pattern is written in english us terminology the pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl in this picture i have demonstrated with size small for the upper back and upper front we re going to work back and forth in the row then we re going to join in the round and work on the body gauge blocked 13 st x 17 row = 4 yarn needed 740 780 830 870 920 960 yards measurements after blocked xs = 40 body circumference x 20 94″ length s = 42 46 body circumference x 21 41″ length m = 44 92 body circumference x 22 82″ length l = 47 38 body circumference x 23 29″ length xl = 49 84 body circumference x 24 70″ length xxl = 52 30 body circumference x 25 17″ length thank you for stopping by happy knitting
